body: This author has some top tier storytelling skill. See how deep the story feels after just a few pages? This is almost like the first chapter of a manga! Oh and also go read Touge Oni, it's this author's currently running manga on Harta mag
@kgfjemeir parent's can't die in 5 years if they're already dead by my own hands. Big think thonk.
@kgfjemeir that's IF I don't want them dead in the first place
Yeah I can, I'm still waiting for the one where I die in my sleep for 5 years ago, you lazy piece of shit. God, putting that shit in a h-doujin site of all places, I can't take you seriously.

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. Sorry y'all i got cursed too, you can't understimate random people curse
For some reason i find this more interesting then disturbing... Idk why when i hate guro alot.
